Ability Learnset

By leveling up

Level Ability Cost Description
1 Own Tempo 2 This Pokémon has its own tempo, and that prevents it from becoming confused.
1 Technician 59 Powers up the Pokémon's weaker moves.
18 Screen Cleaner 12 Entering a battle nullifies the effects of Light Screen, Reflect, and Aurora Veil.
36 Quick Draw 27 Enables the Pokémon to move first occasionally.
54 Moody 45 Raises one stat sharply and lowers another every turn.
72 Emergency Exit -21 The Pokémon, sensing danger, switches out when its HP becomes half or less.
90 Contrary 72 Makes stat changes have an opposite effect.
100 Huge Power 159 Doubles the Pokémon's Attack stat.
  • Bold indicates a default ability if multiple abilities are disabled
  • Italic indicates hidden ability if multiple abilities are disabled

By Disc

Disc Ability Cost Description
Disc 07 Illuminate 11 Raises the Pokémon's evasiveness.
Disc 08 Trace 11 When it enters a battle, the Pokémon copies an opposing Pokémon's Ability.
Disc 11 Ball Fetch 0 If the Pokémon is not holding an item, it will fetch the first failed thrown Poké Ball.
Disc 33 Technician 59 Powers up the Pokémon's weaker moves.
Disc 50 Oblivious 11 The Pokémon is oblivious, and that keeps it from being infatuated or taunted.
  • Bold indicates a default ability if multiple abilities are disabled
  • Italic indicates hidden ability if multiple abilities are disabled

By tutoring

Ability Cost Description
Aerilate 68 Normal-type moves become Flying-type moves. Their power is boosted a little.
Analytic 18 Boosts move power when the Pokémon moves last.
Butterfingers -23 The Pokémon may drop its held item when hit by a damaging move.
Calcifate 60 Normal-type moves become Rock-type moves. Their power is boosted a little.
Calderize 68 Normal-type moves become Fire-type moves. Their power is boosted a little.
Carbonize 68 Normal-type moves become Steel-type moves. Their power is boosted a little.
Cognizate 68 Normal-type moves become Psychic-type moves. Their power is boosted a little.
Color Change 1 The Pokémon's type becomes the type of the move used on it.
Combat Surge 75 Turns the ground into Combat Terrain when the Pokémon enters a battle.
Combatize 68 Normal-type moves become Fighting-type moves. Their power is boosted a little.
Contrary 72 Makes stat changes have an opposite effect.
Convection 49 The Pokémon generates blustery winds when it's hit by an attack.
Defeatist -54 Halves the Pokémon's Attack and Sp. Atk stats when its HP becomes half or less.
Distillize 68 Normal-type moves become Water-type moves. Their power is boosted a little.
Electric Surge 75 Turns the ground into Electric Terrain when the Pokémon enters a battle.
Emergency Exit -21 The Pokémon, sensing danger, switches out when its HP becomes half or less.
Flawed Form -1 Halves the Pokémon's Sp. Def stat.
Floral Surge 75 Turns the ground into Floral Terrain when the Pokémon enters a battle.
Fog Warning 75 The Pokémon creates an eerie fog upon entering battle.
Friend Guard 28 Reduces damage done to allies.
Fumigate 68 Normal-type moves become Poison-type moves. Their power is boosted a little.
Galvanize 68 Normal-type moves become Electric-type moves. Their power is boosted a little.
Grassy Surge 75 Turns the ground into Grassy Terrain when the Pokémon enters a battle.
Hive Mind 68 Normal-type moves become Bug-type moves. Their power is boosted a little.
Huge Power 159 Doubles the Pokémon's Attack stat.
Immoralize 68 Normal-type moves become Dark-type moves. Their power is boosted a little.
Imperious -114 This Pokémon sometimes refuses to obey its Trainer.
Infiltrator 27 Passes through the opposing Pokémon's barrier, substitute, and the like and strikes.
Klutz -39 The Pokémon can't use any held items.
Libero 60 Changes the Pokémon's type to the type of the move it's about to use.
Magic Guard 69 The Pokémon only takes damage from attacks.
Misty Surge 75 Turns the ground into Misty Terrain when the Pokémon enters a battle.
Morbid Surge 75 Turns the ground into Morbid Terrain when the Pokémon enters a battle.
Neutralizing Gas 68 When in the battle, the effects of all Pokémon's Abilities will be nullified.
Normalize 2 All the Pokémon's moves become Normal type. Their power is boosted a little.
Noxious Surge 75 Turns the ground into Noxious Terrain when the Pokémon enters a battle.
Own Tempo 2 This Pokémon has its own tempo, and that prevents it from becoming confused.
Pixilate 68 Normal-type moves become Fairy-type moves. Their power is boosted a little.
Prankster 69 Gives priority to the Pokémon's status moves.
Pressure System 75 The Pokémon generates blustery winds when it enters battle.
Primal Surge 75 Turns the ground into Primal Terrain when the Pokémon enters a battle.
Primalize 68 Normal-type moves become Dragon-type moves. Their power is boosted a little.
Psychic Surge 75 Turns the ground into Psychic Terrain when the Pokémon enters a battle.
Pure Power 159 Using its pure power, the Pokémon doubles its Sp. Attack stat.
Quick Draw 27 Enables the Pokémon to move first occasionally.
Refrigerate 68 Normal-type moves become Ice-type moves. Their power is boosted a little.
Screen Cleaner 12 Entering a battle nullifies the effects of Light Screen, Reflect, and Aurora Veil.
Shrapnel Surge 75 Turns the ground into Shrapnel Terrain when the Pokémon enters a battle.
Simple 69 The stat changes the Pokémon receives are doubled.
Slow Start -75 For five turns, the Pokémon's Attack and Speed stats are halved.
Stall -27 The Pokémon moves after all other Pokémon do.
Tectonic Surge 75 Turns the ground into Tectonic Terrain when the Pokémon enters a battle.
Terralate 68 Normal-type moves become Ground-type moves. Their power is boosted a little.
Terrorize 68 Normal-type moves become Ghost-type moves. Their power is boosted a little.
Truant -74 The Pokémon can't use a move if it had used a move on the previous turn.
Unaware 60 When attacking, the Pokémon ignores the target Pokémon's stat changes.
Weak Bones -14 Halves the Pokémon's Defense stat.
